HiWelcome to the forum!There is a chance that you have hiatal hernia and a gastric reflux. The reflux can cause a metallic taste in the mouth and the hernia can push up the heart and lung when the stomach moves through the diaphragm into the chest cavity. Such a swelling will appear and disappear as yours is doing. Tumors, localized blood collection etc will not cause a swelling that comes and goes. Another swelling that can come and go is a lymph node. This however has a well defined outline.Your doctor is probably right in referring you to a gastroenterologist.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage.
